events.comment: Touch box to destroy, spawn a bone, add to bone count.
Go to title screen if home clicked

event-group.description: Controls navigation to levels when icons clicked.
event-group.title: Level Navigation

events.comment: If the dog falls outside the layout, destroy it, display game over text, then restart after 2 seconds.

sub-events.comment: Increase the historical level if player has won a new level.

events.comment: If all the boxes have been destroyed and the dog is on the floor (it overlaps it 10 pixels down), display the success text then restart after 2 seconds.
Planks and boxes should be destroyed outside of the layout.
